website_summaries.verdict: Wows the crowd with its lightning-fast processing and refresh rate. Many are not as impressed with its sound quality, though.
pros: Incredible refresh rate makes this ideal for action and sports
Down firing and base reflex speaker
cons: Many find the speakers to be subpar

customer_reviews.title: It's Samsung just buy it good tv.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mom - she thinks I actually love her now ha ha - I guess she likes it - well she is over 80 so she grew up when TV's were just becoming popular and beginning to be in everyone's home. The screens back then were the size of an iphone but the entire size of the tv was close to the size of an elephant. So she thinks this is the bomb works good even if you don't have HDTV cable service she has cable but does not have the HDTV capability but this looks better than her other tv which is the old type. Maybe I'm back in the will now who knows.
customer_reviews.author: Timberwolf

customer_reviews.title: Great tv for six months then out goes the sound
customer_reviews.text: Great tv for six months then out goes the sound. Called samsung for help and the best they could do was send me on a 240 mile round trip to a samsung approved service center that is only open in the day time so I would have to take half a day off work twice to get it fixed. So unless you live close to a service center think twice about this tv.
customer_reviews.author: james zinger

customer_reviews.title: This is a really good deal
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Nintendo Switch. Works great, no problem connecting with the game or with WiFi. Fine for watching broadcast TV, but I bought a digital antenna for decent reception. The feet are okay, I put them in correctly and used the screws provided to secure them, so they don't feel as though they are going to fall out and there is no wobble. But they do not balance the TV all that well. For example, if I had a cat I would be worried about it crawling behind the TV and knocking it over. So, use a wall mount or place in a low-traffic area.
customer_reviews.author: Irish4TW

customer_reviews.title: Not working properly right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: The TV was fine for what it was- utilitarian. I purchased it to replace an older Samsung. I've had good experiences with Samsung in the past but this particular TV started flickering from Day One. Very disappointing. I contacted Amazon who referred me to Samsung to try to troubleshoot but that didn't help. Samsung wanted to send a repair person (or have me drop it off??? NOT!) but I was not about to spend half a day waiting for repair on a new set. Boo- Samsung. Yea- Amazon. I called Amazon and they issued me a credit right away with a return label. Yes- it's still inconvenient but more reasonable. Bad TV. Luck of the draw? You decide.
customer_reviews.author: WhyJ9

customer_reviews.title: Great Little TV with awesome speakers.
customer_reviews.text: Great little tv for my young daughters room. I didn't realize it at the time of purchase, but these must have some pretty exceptional speakers. She routinely cranks it up to 140 decibels, which in some cases is described as "threshold of pain, all frequencies". It seems she doesn't truly enjoy the act of watching and listening to her television unless her ears are bleeding. Additionally, the sleep timer appears to be correct.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Samsung 32 inch  720p LED TV  $169.00
customer_reviews.text: I bought this TV to replace an old TV in the dining room. It is a 2015 model and does not have Amazon Firefox installed on it. I have an extra Firefox remote and so I intend to use it on this TV set. The picture is very good and the sound seems fine too. I think that this set is a great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Snow

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to compliment the earlier version of this brand, make and model. They look identical in the front withe the same picture quality. The only difference is in how the connectors are configured in the back of the unit. I bought this as a second screen for my audio workstation and it is perfect. Every now and then I'll watch a movie on it but for the most part, its used as a second monitor. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Rumplestilskin

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Set up was incredibly easy. Inputs are clearly labeled, and the auto set up was easy, accurate, and fast. Beautiful picture I expected from Samsung, fluid and equally good from all inputs. The sound is clear and has good volume. Volume range is a tad small, but plenty to fill the room. Thin, even with feet. Incredibly glad I went with this model instead of one of the less-expensive, off-brand ones I considered.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this TV for my six year old son and it looks great in his room. All ports are on the back of the TV. I was worried because the listing said it only had one HDMI port, but it actually has two. I ordered from Amazon, rather than a marketplace seller and it arrived quickly and without any damages. Set up was quick and easy. I don't feel the legs supporting the TV are flimsy, they seem pretty sturdy to me. They don't take up a lot of space either. Very satisfied with this purchase and I recommend it, especially because I got it for sale for $189. It's my first Samsung and won't be my last!
customer_reviews.author: thebookkeeper

customer_reviews.title: TV electrical inputs
customer_reviews.text: This television lacked an input that I needed for my DVD player in addition to the another device. The video was the usual Samsung outstanding quality. The price was more than fair as Amazon always is. I would definitely recommend this tv if therer would have been sufficient inputs. Check the input/output configuration if possible before making a tv purchase - one of life's lessons.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pepoon

customer_reviews.title: NOT HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure where the short coming starts, the first New 32 inch Samsung TV when set up only half of the screen worked alright things happen I reordered another one the second one after unboxing the TV another disappointment this time the cord to the TV is missing now I have lost all confidence in the shipper and Samsung Electronics though ordering new items it seems that I am getting refurbished TV's NOT HAPPY.
customer_reviews.author: Big AL

customer_reviews.title: Great buy nice picture.............
customer_reviews.text: AS others stated...base is not stable but, tv is in a cabinet and not moved....no problem.....does use a external power supply but, again no problem hides behind tv in cabinet....tv would not program to cable......as often happens Comcast receiver dropped out.....rebooted and tv programed to cable ....also I have run a HDMI cable to tv and has a great picture.......All in all...this is a great buy..half the cost of a 19" lcd tv purchased 7 years ago !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cal

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Inexpensive TV
customer_reviews.text: The first one I ordered had defective speakers. I returned it for a replacement. Big props to Amazon. Their return policy is generous and the return process could not be easier. The TV itself is a very nice TV. No it does not compare to my 50" Samsung but also only cost a fraction of the cost of the 50". Although this is an inexpensive TV and does not have the picture or sound of a more expensive TV it's still of good quality which I have come to expect from Samsung. If you're looking for an inexpensive TV for a guest room or child's room this TV will fit the bill. I'm very pleased with this TV.
customer_reviews.author: Charles C. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Super TV!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent TV. So light weight was easy to install. Picture quality is very good and sound it pretty good too. It set's itself up pretty much plug -n- play! I pushed enter on the remote I think 3 times and she was good to go. I installed this TV in my camper. The thin edges made it possible in the space I had to work with. The light weight made it easy! I got this from Amazon's Used Like New so was a killer deal!
customer_reviews.author: M. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful viewing
customer_reviews.text: This arrived damaged, Amazon quickly replaced it and had it shipped immediately. I returned the damage one two days before the new one arrived. I purchased this for my elderly mother who recently moved to assisted living. I am amazed at the quality of picture. Fits perfectly on an end table. We chose not to hang it as we're responsible for any damage to the walls. Amazon has a photo to determine the distance and size for viewing. I found that very helpful when purchasing. Price is right. My mother and I are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: MotherofMims

customer_reviews.title: Surround sound for connected firestick
customer_reviews.text: I love this tv & have had it for 3 years, but now I've connected a fire stick to it & can't figure out how to add a speaker system to be the fire stick. I have a surround sound system connected to my tv, but can't figure out how to get the audio system to work on the fire stick. Any ideas?
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Cost efficient by far 📺
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2...for bedrooms. Picture quality is great. Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Samsung
customer_reviews.text: I dislike that the sound comes from the back of the t.v., the picture is disappointing for Samsung and it has very few features compared to any commercial Samsung Smart HDTV. What I like is the size, which is less than 38 inches.
customer_reviews.author: RegalTiger77

customer_reviews.title: Annoying External power supply
customer_reviews.text: TV feels cheap. Annoying External power supply. Picture is fine but small down facing speakers sound like crap. I need to mount it to the wall or hook up external sound. TV broke after 9 months but they fixed it under warranty. We also had purchased the 2 year extended warranty which was a good thing as the PCB board burnt out. Now that it's repaired I don't trust this thing . Samsung used to be quality. They probably went to a contracted manufacturing like Sony that hasn't made their own in years. Very little quality anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty D.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I wanted a simple flat screen, no frills, bells and whistles, and we were looking for a great price. The picture quality is really nice, sound is effective; we purchased it for our bedroom. I'm giving this a four out of five star rating because my husband did have problems getting it mounted to the stand that we bought along with it, if you purchase this TV and plan to mount it on the wall, be prepared to go and buy longer bolts to secure it. Other than that great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Gina U.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware - Sound Dies Fast!!
customer_reviews.text: This tv seemed like a good deal, but the sound just suddenly went completely out without any warning. Right in the middle of watching a movie, suddenly there is no sound at all & Samsung is no help.
customer_reviews.author: Marcella Wright

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous picture, foul sound
customer_reviews.text: This has a very good picture. And the sound is truly terrible no matter how much I monkey around with the possibilities. It's tinny and buzzy. I'm trying to find something I can plug into it for auxiliary speakers. I know a sound bar is recommended but I've been trying to juryrig other speakers without success as yet.
customer_reviews.author: poetichaos

customer_reviews.title: 3/5- used for Grandma's TV
customer_reviews.text: Fine TV for the money, but the strange remote functions left my elderly grandmother confused on usage. 720p is a fine resolution for a 32" screen- seeing as anything under 40" seems to be getting phased out by most manufacturers. Overall pleased- just wish the push for 1080p and a regular remote were options for this screen size and model from Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce The Goose

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my niece who just moved into her own place (she asked me to get one for black Friday and gave me cash and I missed all the really good deals that day). This is a very light TV and it is perfect size for her apartment. Crazy to think that something so light and easy to move is the same size at the big console TV in most living rooms when I was a kid. I can not say how the picture and sound are as we hooked it up for her and left but it is Samsung so I have no doubt that it will be beyond perfect for her.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Love it BUT
customer_reviews.text: Love it BUT, I wish it had the screws or at least the SIZE listed of what machine screws are needed to mount it to a wall mount. Took quite a bit to get it hung on the wall. Legs are pretty lame if you are just using it on a surface. They hold up the very lightweight TV, but do not look good. Was thrilled to get a 32" for the price. Same as SAMS on Cyber Monday and no tax.
customer_reviews.author: L. Judah

customer_reviews.title: It's almost like a conspiracy chip device inside the units that can ...
customer_reviews.text: not even barely a year, the sound went out! And Samsung could or did nothing!! Yeh, yeh, yeh 'shoulda bought the EXT WARRANTY...' then I would've never needed it. It's almost like a conspiracy chip device inside the units that can be activated when you DON'T buy the warranty & something then goes wrong. Probably not, but what if!?
customer_reviews.author: SweetStreet

customer_reviews.title: BUT for what i use it for it is awesome. This is a great TV for a child's ...
customer_reviews.text: I have this TV hung on my office wall in case of a community emergency or wanting to watch my soap operas. It is a decent picture and a standard 32" size. There is no connectivity, only one HDMI port, and only 720p image, BUT for what i use it for it is awesome. This is a great TV for a child's room or playroom or even the office. IF you are intending to watch movies and videos with great quality, save up and buy the higher end model, but if you just want to relax and watch a show, I highly recommend this TV.
customer_reviews.author: kporche

customer_reviews.title: An excellent TV so far
customer_reviews.text: An excellent TV so far. This is our third flat screen TV in the house. One in the living room I paid $1,600. for and the other I paid 7 or $800 for. I can honestly say that this TV has a better, clearer, brighter color picture than either of the other 2. Also, The sound is really good, which is unusual for most TVs. No need to purchase a sound system for this one! So far I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nrvusrek

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product description
customer_reviews.text: The set does not have a headphones outlet, some what was standard even on the cheapest TV sets. Since we have a family member who is hard of hearing and must use headphones. we had the return the set partially unpacked. This cost us in Canada postage $63.
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good looking, inexpensive little LED HDTV. More inputs would have been nice but two HDMI seems to be standard on lower end models. The picture and sound are adequate for the price range, but nothing to write home about. This TV was purchased for a young child and fit that use perfectly, if buying for an adult then spend a few extra bucks and get a 1080p set, maybe even a Smart one if you don't have a device connected that will fill those needs.
customer_reviews.author: Six20SevenTop Contributor: DC Comics

customer_reviews.title: A heads up for those using Sat Dish Servers
customer_reviews.text: The sheets (they don't give you a booklet) do not give all the instructions you need for setup. If, like me, you have to choose HDMI1 as source"... to set the plug/play issues (clock, etc.) you must change source to: TV, then scroll to plug/play. After completing settings you have to go back to source and change it back to HDMI1 again. You'd think they'd put P/P in the main menu.. Idiocy. Other than that it's an okay TV. Sound: C-, picture: B, remote: B-
customer_reviews.author: Mj Cloud

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: The TV was advertised "as new- still in box". The "box" was in tatters and held together by gobs of sticky tape. The front black frame of the TV was scratched/blemished in several places . The TV worked. I kept it ...how the heck was I going send that "box" back!
customer_reviews.author: Denham  Fields

customer_reviews.title: I've loved mine though
customer_reviews.text: I got this on black friday, which is when I hear they use cheaper discount hardware to lower the prices. I've loved mine though, and I haven't had any issues with it. Great picture, and I just use rabbit ears for local OTA channels and a chromecast for Netflix.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer L

customer_reviews.title: Warranty
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than i thought but like it Told I have to contact Amazon for warranty that I purchased..Waiting for my 3 year waranty from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great TV. This TV has minimum input lag (the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great TV. This TV has minimum input lag (the real reason I bought it) which makes it perfect for gaming and playing otherwise. I use it with my PS4 and XB360 with no noticeable input lag. It also can be connected using an HDMI cable to a PC or Mac to be used as an external monitor. Great TV (oddly enough not even being used as a classic television) and monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymouse

customer_reviews.title: great price for the size
customer_reviews.text: Ok as a TV, I just want to say this is all I needed and all I asked for, great price for the size, yadda yadda yadda. If you want a good TV, this one is good. B) Just seriously, don't be me, buy the soundbar. The sound quality isn't bad, it's just really quiet I guess? My TV is like 6 ft away and I have it waaaay louder than my old one. It has like, no base I think? Idk what I'm trying to say is good product, just buy the soundbar too.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Picture is awesome! Suffers on the audio, needs additional speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: The first one that was sent was made in CHINA. It was crap. It flickered, so we sent it back, BUT
customer_reviews.text: The new one made in Tijuana Mexico, and everyone remarks how beautiful the picture is. As the vendor to send you one made in Mexico, not china.
customer_reviews.author: D. R. Hornock

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for a Bedroom
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this 32 inch Samsung television for my bedroom. It is the perfect size for this small room. It has a sharp clear picture. The factory settings for color was perfect. I didn't have to change it at all! I did want to use the closed captioning feature which was simple to do. The TV menu is easy to use, and guides you through the steps needed to complete each option. I highly recommend this TV !
customer_reviews.author: Karen H. Freedman

customer_reviews.title: Not a "Smart" TV, But One More Feature Would Have Been Smarter
customer_reviews.text: Very nice images. The only reason not 5 stars is it would have been smart to have variable height legs. The only place for our cable box is underneath the TV and the only way we could do that was to put books underneath the legs until a more attractive alternative is found. Other than that, it's an LED TV that's looks good and works well.
customer_reviews.author: icopus

customer_reviews.title: No audio outputs
customer_reviews.text: Spend a little more for audio outputs. Volume isn't very good at all
customer_reviews.author: kyle Waggoner

customer_reviews.title: Have always had good luck with Samsung products althought they tend to be ...
customer_reviews.text: put this tv up int he kitchen. Have always had good luck with Samsung products althought they tend to be a little too sharp someties. This tv is very realistic on HD and the std signal is pretty good as well. I have mine mounted pretty high on the wall and the viewing must be pretty wide because the picture looks great .
customer_reviews.author: neil o

customer_reviews.title: not for Cord Cutters
customer_reviews.text: plenty of good things to say - works well - has held up well but we live about 40 miles from the nearest tv station and we're cord cutters and this is definitely not the right TV. We sometimes have a weak signal and then the TV drops the station from the line-up. Have to wait for a "good" day and rescan. It's a real pain. Have to other TV's and we don't have this problem with them.
customer_reviews.author: LoveToShop

customer_reviews.title: Sound went out in a few months and i had ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound went out in a few months and i had to buy a whole board to fit ...it works now
customer_reviews.author: Alibaba

customer_reviews.title: 1 star
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Owned it 13 months and now it won't turn on. After some investigation I found that this is a common problem in all of their TVs. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: John H

customer_reviews.title: The tv sucks
customer_reviews.text: It sucks it has bottons on the tv and remot has no number on it. it like buying a new strip car with no features dont buy it. And it cost 116.00 dollars to send it back its a rep off.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Moreno

customer_reviews.title: this is fantastic. Size-wise this is so much nicer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my younger son's bedroom. Compared to my older TV in my other son's room, this is fantastic. Size-wise this is so much nicer. It takes up far less room than the other TV (both are 32" tv's). It is very thin and very stable. The picture quality is very good. I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: the price was fantastic and I consider it to be more than comparable ...
customer_reviews.text: "Samsung" is a name, no longer associated with inferior audio/video products. For this particular item the quality was greatly improved, the price was fantastic and I consider it to be more than comparable to many other brand name televisions on the market today.
customer_reviews.author: D Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Happy with Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great tv for the bedroom or den. I had to adjust the size of the picture, etc. The sound is pretty good. Turned all the way up on some stations lower for others. Picture is pretty good. Some channels differ. Still for what I paid for it I'm very pleased. Extremely light to move around. Happy with PURCHASE..
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking TV
customer_reviews.text: I bought this TV for my dorm room last year and I think its great! Samsung is of course a very reliable brand, but regardless the picture quality is great and there are enough ports on the back of the TV to connect to all of mt desired devices!
customer_reviews.author: JHandy1414

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as presented in add. Easy to setup.
customer_reviews.text: 34" inch perfection. For the bedroom! Samsung delivers high quality picture, color,clarity too!
customer_reviews.author: c. olsen

customer_reviews.title: great tvs for a childs room or a second one
customer_reviews.text: great tvs for a childs room or a second one. I purchased 2 for both my children and let them set it up themselves with no issues. Great picture quaity and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Zampaloni

customer_reviews.title: This was a great but. My son needed a new tv
customer_reviews.text: This was a great but. My son needed a new tv, but, him being an avid gamer, nor just any tv would do. After much research I found this baby. The performance isn't quite on par with a true gaming monitor, but it costs a lot less, and is also a quality television. Win win.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Reviews Stuff

customer_reviews.title: Worth The Price
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the price. I am happy with the picture quality. You have to ride the audio a little on the higher side but still good. I would recommend this product to anyone who doesn't need anything fancy but wants a decent size screen and picture audio quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: B. D.

customer_reviews.title: perfect product for 200 bucks
customer_reviews.text: perfect product for 200 bucks. People complain about volume but if it is quite or near quite in the room you are in with the tv it is definitely at a volume that anyone can hear even if you have. Graphics are good but not great, BUT for the price you pay it is worth it. from a distance of 4 feet or more the graphics are clear and you won't notice the difference between this tv and one that 3x as much. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Friend

customer_reviews.title: We love it! Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We love this TV out on the porch! Picture is awesome and we watch movies on our firestick almost every night out on our screen porch!
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product
customer_reviews.text: I realized too late that this tv is broken. It doesn’t connect to any Source- wireless or wired. It doesn’t even give the option to connect to any source, it just keeps running channel searches that never connect to anything either.
customer_reviews.author: cristina westenburg

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my girlfriend for Christmas, but of course she guessed it so we just opened it and set it up. It's a great tv with good sound and a nice responsive remote. The picture is very clear as you would expect from a Samsung TV. Would recommend to any buyer.
customer_reviews.author: Adnan Halasa

customer_reviews.title: but this TV is great! It's lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Black Friday special to replace an older TV I had (the old one only had 1 HDMI input - unheard of nowadays!). I wasn't sure what to expect for the price I paid, but this TV is great! It's lightweight, the color is great, and the sound is great! I'd buy again if I needed another TV, for sure!
customer_reviews.author: AndreaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: So lightweight! Love this because it's not dangerous for tipping if you have children. It weighs about 5 pounds. Easy to set up the smart TV functions, and the Netflix button is a great feature. Clear picture and good sound.
customer_reviews.author: RDemps14

customer_reviews.title: It's alright, nothing to jump up and down about
customer_reviews.text: Volume does not go very high at all. Picture quality is good. I guess ya get what ya paid for. Samsung has definitely gone downhill in quality. I have another flat screen Samsung, same size that I purchased 9 years ago, and it still blows the new one away.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Venz

customer_reviews.title: Not good for HDMI devices
customer_reviews.text: Very frustrated, I bought this tv to watch outside with an amazon fire stick. The tv refuses to recognize the device. I tried two different devices, researched all the fixes and nothing worked. I then tried chromecast, and MIDI cord, and a android box and same thing, the tv doesn't recognize any of them. Unfortunately I bought the tv during a black Friday sale and now I cant return.
customer_reviews.author: Shana

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace an ancient box and have Netflix/YouTube/Pandora streaming ability. So far, a fantastic produce at a great price! Not a big screen, of course, but great for our little condo living room. The footings could be more stable, they're just cheap plastic, but not an issue of you wall mount or don't move it at all.
customer_reviews.author: CAR

customer_reviews.title: I bought this tv in july of 2015 and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tv in july of 2015 and it already died for some reason or other, first the sound now everything, If I would have known it would only last a year I would have bought something else. boooooooo Jack Seprish
customer_reviews.author: bikerdude

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Got about $50 off the "new" price for buying a "used" one in "very good" condition. The only thing damaged was the box! The picture is great and the volume levels are much better than the 3 year old oCosmo it is replacing. The stand is kinda flimsy but, it's just sitting on my dresser so, not that big of a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Star16

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Great
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for.my 98 yeaars young auntie, aand she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jellybean15

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Seen some negative reviews so I was hesitant on buying one but still made the plunge. It has been a great tv so far with zero issues. Set up was quick and easy. TV is on at least 12 hours a day for different people. Love it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Big Bear

customer_reviews.title: but these 32" TVs are good for their price
customer_reviews.text: These TVs can do 1080p as well. May not be advertised, but these 32" TVs are good for their price. Can't ask for more stars when what I paid for, I see/experienced more than what was promised.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Forbes

customer_reviews.title: Very nice TV
customer_reviews.text: I like my TV. The only thing is I need another one for my office. Volume is great the picture is great. I love it. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: Plug and play
customer_reviews.text: The Picture and sound quality are good. The 32" did not come in with any dead pixels or damage. The plastic legs are extremely easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Arjenis

customer_reviews.title: OK....but
customer_reviews.text: Great picture, but the sound only goes to 25 making it difficult to hear sometimes with background noise. I wonder if this is why I got such a good price on a TV set in which the box had already been open. I wonder it this TV is actually one someone else returned because of the sound problem?
customer_reviews.author: Joanne A. Currey

customer_reviews.title: good picture, light weight screen
customer_reviews.text: Use in bedroom to replace old TV, good picture, light weight screen. Remote the weak link, would prefer different design that is more conducive to human use.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Laurent

customer_reviews.title: Great bedroom TV, All the setting optios i could want
customer_reviews.text: Watch good ole broadcast, dvds and VHS tapes. All look great. Sound even has an option for voice enhancing. Point taken off because feet suck. Fall off and are at edges. Rather have a center one
customer_reviews.author: Porcelain Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Great Telly
customer_reviews.text: Great television with great picture just make sure you buy speakers with it and the stand for it is a bit naff. I will always stick with Samsung TVs as I think the quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: amonkeyfishdonegood

customer_reviews.title: Very nice TV and great price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Mother in her relatively small living room. Great picture, great color and easy to connect to cable. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Kansas Girl

customer_reviews.title: and it doesn't get super loud, but it's loud enough for a 12x16 ...
customer_reviews.text: There's not much volume change between the 20s and 70s, and it doesn't get super loud, but it's loud enough for a 12x16 room. Good quality picture and sound overall.
customer_reviews.author: Cordelia L.

customer_reviews.title: Good picture, decent price.
customer_reviews.text: Bundled this television with an  as a Christmas present and boy did it go over well. Good picture quality for a decent price. Sound is what you would expected from a television set.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Treadupon

customer_reviews.title: TV was great packaging.....
customer_reviews.text: This came without a box. So there it sat on my porch without a box to cover what was inside. Anyone could have driven by and seen a big TV sitting there for the taking. Let alone it was a gift and could have been seen by a recipient. Luckily my neighbor saw it while I was working and put it inside for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: TV died in 2 and 1/2 years
customer_reviews.text: My TV finally took a complete dump on my 2 years and a couple months... pretty sad i must say. The sound went out first, then three months later while using an external speaker the picture cut out.
customer_reviews.author: Breanne

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This set was a good choice . It has awesome color , and the picture is very clear and lifelike . The size is perfect for the space we have , and the price was a wonderful bonus . Love it .
customer_reviews.author: dodi534

customer_reviews.title: not disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Great picture quality. Takes about 4 seconds to power on. Love the shape of the end of the power, less likely to break.
customer_reviews.author: Rayne

customer_reviews.title: Delighted!!
customer_reviews.text: Delighted !!!!! I am older, have irregular sleep patterns and six little dogs who watch TV. So I leave it on 24/7 ! Crisp picture. easy remote . And $$$$$$$ CHEAPER than local stores !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Tv works fine, ours didn't have a side port as pictured
customer_reviews.text: We love Samsung TVs and this one is fine. The only reason it is getting 4 stars is because the tv pictured has a side port and the one we received doesn't. It made things a bit tricky since we mounted the TV on the wall, but it wasn't impossible to fix so a return wasn't necessary.
customer_reviews.author: R. NBP

customer_reviews.title: Samsung is always a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: The Samsung TV is always top quality. I could not ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: Janet M Severson

customer_reviews.title: I love my new TV== since for years my old one ...
customer_reviews.text: I love my new TV== since for years my old one was 18" =now my 32 " seems like a giant one
customer_reviews.author: dagmar kunc

customer_reviews.title: Great for my toddler's room
customer_reviews.text: I bought this TV for my 3 yr old son's room and it is perfect. It arrived without any damage and the picture is very clear. I am very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn A.

customer_reviews.title: Not durable, purchased in February 2018 went bad in AAugust 2018
customer_reviews.text: Started working fine after setup however about one month ago the picture started fragmenting and freezing leaving only audio, now there's no sound or anything on the screen except a flashing light which stops after a couple seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Louis

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting better sound quality out of the box like my other Samsung tv.
customer_reviews.author: Van Go

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: fine, but not a smart TV so needs an antenna to work without getting cable
customer_reviews.author: saul erlbaum

customer_reviews.title: Mom loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement for my mom's television. Good quality picture and sound.
customer_reviews.author: mamamoll

customer_reviews.title: She says the picture looks great & the remote is easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: I bout this tv for my mom. She loves it. She immediately had it installed in her bedroom where when watches her spanish soap opera's. She says the picture looks great & the remote is easy to handle. She's very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Starlight

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: VERY good TV for the buck. Easy to set up and use. The mount is a little weird so you need to have a table as wide as the TV to use it or use a wall mount, which most people do. Great resolution...it's a Samsung...what more needs to be said?
customer_reviews.author: S.D.Young

customer_reviews.title: Very Good for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Great price, good visuals -tho you have to work to get it right for black and white Classic movies. Moving from "sources " pretty clumsy. Tinny sound, no fix for that but a sound bar that costs as much as the TV. A good choice while we wait for further advances.
customer_reviews.author: Joy in NM

customer_reviews.title: Surprising Quality.
customer_reviews.text: While only a 720, the picture quality is excellent. The sound too. I was always a Sony fan but this unit is very good and impressed me. Excellent for a small family room or master bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: ACB

customer_reviews.title: Samsung NJ400032 inch television
customer_reviews.text: Great television for the price. Te color are beautiful and crisp. Sun's is wonderful and picture is beautiful as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Kindel

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with TV but happy with Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Sorry to say but I am not happy with this product the sound is sounds like it's in the tin Box coming out and I thought it had other feature so I'm very disappointed but happy with Amazon and the service that you provide
customer_reviews.author: Pattie dockweiler

customer_reviews.title: the picture and sound are great, but i really depend upon captioning
customer_reviews.text: the picture and sound are great, but i really depend upon captioning, which this tv will not deliver via either an audio/video cord feed or HDMI feed....i haven't been home enough to figure out what to do, but this would definitely have been enough to scare me off if i had known this from the get-go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Samsung tv
customer_reviews.text: Sorry I had to return tv .it was to low for my stand
customer_reviews.author: chicago

customer_reviews.title: Yeah Samsung
customer_reviews.text: I have become a fan of Samsung. This is not my first but my third of their TV;s This is used just to watch TV, nothing else and it has a great picture
customer_reviews.author: pjs

customer_reviews.title: Product met expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Picture sharp and clear. Sound could be a little more distinct and clear.
customer_reviews.author: No Name, please.

product_meta.title: Samsung Electronics UN32J4000C 32-Inch 720p LED TV (2015 Model)
product_meta.description:
Experience a wider range of color in clear HD 720p for a truly enriched home entertainment experience. Enjoy your favorite movies, TV and games with enhanced color and brightness in a slimmer profile thanks to the J4000’s Slim FLED backlighting technology.

AMAZON.COM
feature_bullets: Enjoy a great picture with Samsung 720p high definition (HD), which makes your favorite films and games more detailed, vibrant and clear;Speaker Type : Down Firing + Base Reflex (2CH)
Enjoy a clear moving picture resolution at Motion Rate 60 with amazing refresh rate, processing speed and backlight technology.
See every image as the director intended with enriched colors - even with older, non-HD content.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,123 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
